name: Buzzy - No Code App Builder
description:
Create MVPs, prototypes and apps from Figma. Buzzy enables you to create working apps from your Figma design screens without coding. This means you can create apps, prototypes and MVPs really simply.


You get a full working app that you can edit and update directly in Figma.


Buzzy is a powerful tool that simplifies a designers life.


Getting Started

  1. Download the plugin
  2. Go to our Getting Started guide
  3. Watch the videos and grab the demonstration (example) files
  4. Publish your Figma designs
